Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Courtyard by Marriott Downtown Toronto, you'll be centrally located in Toronto, steps from Buddies in Bad Times Theatre and minutes from Maple Leaf Gardens. This family-friendly hotel is close to University of Toronto and Toronto Public Library.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 575 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an indoor pool and a 24-hour fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a fireplace in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Toronto? This hotel has facilities measuring 13993 square feet (1300 square meters), including conference space.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Buddies in Bad Times Theatre - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Maple Leaf Gardens - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Ryerson University - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Allan Gardens - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi

Queen's Park - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Panasonic Theatre - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Hospital for Sick Children - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Ontario Legislative Building - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Canon Theatre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Mackenzie House - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Church of the Holy Trinity - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Toronto Eaton Centre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Toronto City Hall - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Massey Hall - 1 km / 0.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Toronto, ON (YTZ-Billy Bishop Toronto City) - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Toronto, ON (YYZ-Pearson Intl.) - 18.5 km / 11.5 mi

The preferred airport for Courtyard by Marriott Downtown Toronto is Toronto, ON (YYZ-Pearson Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Courtyard by Marriott Downtown Toronto are:

Toronto, ON (YYZ-Pearson Intl.) - 18.5 km / 11.5 mi

The preferred airport for Courtyard by Marriott Downtown Toronto is Toronto, ON (YYZ-Pearson Intl.).

RoomType.text: Double Newly Renovated, Guest room Advanced Purchase

Message.Text: Note: ** The hotel no longer allows smoking in any guestrooms, public areas, meeting space or food and beverage outlets. There is a charge of $250 should any hotel guest smoke in any guest room. The charge of $250 will be charged to the credit card used per individual upon check-in. Prices are based on single or double occupancy. You may incur additional charges at the time of check-in for additional room occupants as well as the Resort Fees and taxes applied on the additional occupants charges.
